snippet: Whereas Benedict XVI was a theologian who favored ermine-lined cloaks and erudite homilies, Francis appears to be sending a message of radical humility.
abstract: Francis, in first 24 hours as pope, appears to be sending message of radical humility with his simple tastes and lifestyle, dramatic shift from papacy of Benedict XVI, who favored red loafers, ermine-lined cloaks and papal fashions from centuries past.

byline.contributor: Elisabetta Povoledo and Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Whereas Benedict XVI was a theologian who favored ermine-lined cloaks and erudite homilies, Francis appears to be sending a message of radical humility.

headline.seo: Pope Francis Shifts Vatican’s Tone With Simple Acts
headline.main: With Simple Actions and Dress, New Pope Shifts Tone at Vatican
headline.print_headline: With Simple Actions and Dress, New Pope Shifts Tone at the Vatican
